body_html: There are a number of TF paradigms that previously worked because ExponentialMovingAverage didn't respect variable scopes (see #5652, for example). In the case you have here, I'm not sure that I understand the semantics of what you are trying to do: regardless of debiasing, it is an error to call apply on the same variable multiple times: "ValueError: If the moving average of one of the variables is already being computed." (from ExponentialMovingAverage description of apply). Are you arguing that the wrong error message is thrown in this case?
